Package sim

Class Client

java.lang.Object
sim.Client
public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
Handles connection to the server and provides methods to issue commands.

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client​(java.lang.String address, int port)
      Initialise connection to server and handshake.
      Parameters:
      address - The address of the server.
      port - The port of the server.

    • Client

      public Client()
      Initialise connection to server and handshake. Default connection: localhost:50000

  • Method Details

    • read

      private java.lang.String read​(int bufferLength) throws java.io.IOException
      Waits for a response from the server and returns it as a string.
      Returns:
      Response from server as a string
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • command

      public java.lang.String command​(java.lang.String payload, int bufferLength)
      Sends a payload to the connected server and waits for a response.
      Parameters:
      payload - The string to send to the server.
      bufferLength - The size of the buffer to store the server's response.
      Returns:
      The server's response to the payload command.

    • command

      public java.lang.String command​(java.lang.String payload)
      Sends a payload to the connected server and waits for a response.
      Parameters:
      payload - The string to send to the server.
      Returns:
      The server's response to the payload command.

    • handshake

      private void handshake()
      Initializes the connection to the server simulator

    • getServers

      public ServerConfig[] getServers​(java.lang.String arg)
      Request server configurations.
      Parameters:
      arg - All | Type [serverType] | Avail [core] [mem] [disk] | Capable [core] [mem] [disk]
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing each server configuration.

    • getServers

      public ServerConfig[] getServers()
      Request all server configurations.
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing each server configuration.

    • getEvent

      public Job getEvent()
      Requests the next available job from the server
      Returns:
      A Job object if a job is available, otherwise null.

    • close

      public void close()
      Attempts to gracefully close the connection to the server.
